questions.question: What key activates the Developer Console?
questions.explanation: Press ~ to open the console and debug the mod in real-time.

questions.question: How do you answer a quiz?
questions.explanation: Type /edu followed by your answer. You can use full sentences!

questions.question: What happens when you answer incorrectly?
questions.correct_answer: The mod logs it as a knowledge gap
questions.explanation: Wrong answers are tracked so you can review them later with the 'study' command.
